examples: I forgot my phone at home again.
Can you repeat that again, please?
He tried again and again until he succeeded.
Eu esqueci meu telefone em casa novamente.
Você pode repetir isso novamente, por favor?
Ele tentou novamente e novamente até que conseguiu.

suggested: Why do fish always sing off-key? Because they can't tuna-fish! (say it again for emphasis)
The thought of having to start all over again can be daunting and disheartening.
Why do I have to do this all again? It's so frustrating and exhausting!
Did you know that 'again' is one of the most commonly used words in the English language?
There's no specific smell associated with 'again', but the smell of a fresh start can be invigorating.
The physical sensation of hitting the reset button and starting again can be both exciting and nerve-wracking.
Starting again can provide an opportunity for growth, learning, and a renewed sense of purpose.
